hard_constraints.description: System configuration policies require that exactly one speaker is active at all times.
To ensure electrical compliance, exactly one amplifier must be selected for the configuration.
The project management standards mandate that exactly one media player is incorporated into the setup.
Compatibility rules dictate that if the Alpha speaker is chosen, the system must use AmpX to maintain safety standards.
Company policy prohibits the configuration of AmpY with Streamer1 to prevent signal failure.
Regulatory compliance requires that Streamer2 only be operated in conjunction with Speaker Beta.
